Fiorentina conceded a 2-1 defeat to Inter on Monday night, as they sit in 6th place with a thre-point deficit from Lazio in 4th place. On the other hand, Como were rather unlucky to lose to Juventus ...

arts.ttl: Fiorentina vs. Como, important points at stake
arts.sum: Fiorentina have won seven of their last 10 home league games (D1 L2) and only Napoli (28) and Inter (27) have gained more points in home matches than Viola in the current Serie A campaign (24, level with Lazio). Patrick Cutrone, who scored a brace against Fiorentina in May 2018 in Serie A, has netted six goals in the current league season: the last Como player to score more in a single Serie A campaign was Dan Corneliusson in 1985/86 (seven).

arts.ttl: Arsenal missed out on Cesc Fabregas 2.0 as Real Madrid star confirms transfer rejection
arts.sum: Real Madrid midfielder Federico Valverde reveals that he turned down the chance to sign for Arsenal at the age of 16, as he was never interested in moving to England.
